claim: Known to support Netflix access from select regions via optimized servers; title availability varies.
Provides low-latency connections when connected to nearby servers, beneficial for online gaming.
Offers P2P-optimized servers suitable for torrenting with split tunneling on supported apps.
Implements a no-logs approach and encrypts traffic with modern VPN protocols.
Can auto-connect on unsecured public Wi-Fi to protect sessions.
Supports secure access to accounts while traveling abroad; reliability can vary by country and ISP.
Supports accessing popular streaming libraries when using optimized servers; availability may change.
